title: Preventative action
creator_credit: John Honey, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Australian marathon runner Robert de Castella talks of his preventative medicine approach to lifestyle. Expectations of cure are very high in society but generally the public doesn’t want to actively participate in prevention. Poses the question: “Who is responsible for providing preventative health care services?”
